description: A simple overview of the most important Docker host and container metrics. (cAdvisor/Prometheus)

targets.query: select count(value) from nginx_logs where log=~ /__20._/
select count(value) from nginx_logs where log=~ /__40._/
select count(value) from nginx_logs where log=~ /__50._/
select count(value) from nginx_logs where log=~ /__30._/

targets.expr:
SELECT relid,schemaname,relname,seq_scan,seq_tup_read,idx_scan,idx_tup_fetch,n_tup_ins,n_tup_upd,n_tup_del,n_tup_hot_upd,n_live_tup,n_dead_tup
FROM pg_stat_all_tables WHERE relname LIKE 'korek%' or relname LIKE 'auth%'
targets.rawSql:
SELECT relid,schemaname,relname,seq_scan,seq_tup_read,idx_scan,idx_tup_fetch,n_tup_ins,n_tup_upd,n_tup_del,n_tup_hot_upd,n_live_tup,n_dead_tup
FROM pg_stat_all_tables WHERE relname LIKE 'korek%' or relname LIKE 'auth%'

targets.expr:
select  
usename as "User", 
application_name as "App", 
client_addr as "IP", 
to_char(backend_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "TimeConnect", 
to_char(query_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "TimeQuery", 
to_char(state_change, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "TimeState", 
state,
query as "Query"
from pg_stat_activity 
where pid <> pg_backend_pid()
AND query not like '%pg_%' AND query not like '%migrations%'
order by backend_start;
targets.rawSql:
select  
usename as "User", 
application_name as "App", 
client_addr as "IP", 
to_char(backend_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "TimeConnect", 
to_char(query_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "TimeQuery", 
to_char(state_change, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as "TimeState", 
state,
query as "Query"
from pg_stat_activity 
where pid <> pg_backend_pid()
AND query not like '%pg_%' AND query not like '%migrations%'
order by backend_start;

title: KOREK monitoring
